name: Bottom Bar
author: Svilen Popov

sections.description:
Bottom Bar is a WordPress plugin which includes a several features (you can see them below). The idea for creating this plugin comes from the facebook bar (in old version; now there is only a chat bar) and from wibiya’s toolbar.

Features

  • Recent posts
  • Popular posts
  • Recent comments
  • Random post
  • Share options (delicious, digg, edno23, facebook, google bookmarks, google buzz, svejo, twitter, stumbleupon, reddit)
  • Language packs (english, bulgarian, deutsch, french, russian, spanish, czech)
  • Restore option (admin option)

IMPORTANT: The plugin requires wp_head() and wp_footer() in order to work properly because they makes some calls to make the plugin appear.perly.

Translators

  • Bulgarian (bg) – Svilen Popov
  • Czech (cz) – Martin Stepic
  • Croation (hr) – Dario
  • Deustch (de) – Altan Tosun
  • English (en) – Svilen Popov
  • French (fr) – Valentin Brandt
  • Italian (it) by Webgenerate
  • Russian (ru) – Дмитрий Мишкин
  • Spanish (es) – Tomás Perrin
  • Turkish (tr) – Yavuz Yayla

If you have created your own language pack, or have an update of an existing one, you can send it to me. If you want to translate the plugin in your language, but you don’t know how, contact me, I’ll help you out.

More information | Screenshots
sections.installation:
1. Unpack the download-package.
  2. Upload ‘bottom-bar’ folder to the ‘/wp-content/plugins/’ directory
  3. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  4. Done and Ready.

More information

0.1.1

  • Initial release

short_description: Bottom Bar is a WordPress plugin that includes a several features for creating interactive and user-friendly toolbar.
